Description:
MechRunner offers players act as XP-41 robot pilot, and confront the evil mechanical army O.S.O.
June 30, 1908 on the Tunguska river there was a powerful explosion that destroyed all living in an area of ??2000 square kilometers. After a few years, scientific expeditions have tried to explain the origin of the accident, but could not come to any conclusions. However, in the mid-1940s, a team of scientists from the Russian special services investigating the explosion place, stumbled upon the wreckage of an alien spacecraft containing technology, well in excess of our own. Later, on the basis of these technologies, the KGB created a new secret weapon, known as O.S.O.
